Text: The total cost of holidaymakers' guarantees to be paid by the Atol scheme  -  underwritten by the Civil Aviation Authority watchdog  -  is an estimated £600m now that the company has gone bust.
Effect: The total cost of holidaymakers' guarantees to be paid by the Atol scheme  -  underwritten by the Civil Aviation Authority watchdog  -  is an estimated £600m
Sentence: <e2>The total cost of holidaymakers' guarantees to be paid by the Atol scheme  -  underwritten by the Civil Aviation Authority watchdog  -  is an estimated £600m</e2> now that <e1>the company has gone bust.</e1>
